articles.description: Here's a perspective on the first five hours of God of War: Ragnarok from somebody that has never played a God of War game in her life.
articles.content:
I’ve never played a God of War game before in my life.

articles.title: Consumer watchdog takes Fitbit to court over claims around customer rights - 9News
articles.description: The Australian Competition and Consumer Commission has launched legal action against Fitbit in the Federal Court, alleging the smartwatch maker misled customers about their rights over faulty products.
